alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Oldham; Shelby; Spencer (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 18 at 2:01AM EDT until July 18 at 2:30AM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 AM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN SPENCER...SOUTHWESTERN OLDHAM...NORTHWESTERN SHELBY AND NORTHEASTERN JEFFERSON COUNTIES... At 201 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Middletown, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Louisville, Jeffersontown, St. Matthews, Lyndon, Middletown, Douglass Hills, Prospect, Hurstbourne, Graymoor-Devondale and Windy Hills. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
